Extension and International Programs



Extension and International Programs
Online degrees, certificate programs, and accelerated courses at California State
                                 University, Fullerton. Your growth is our goal.






Professional Development



Professional Development
Certificate programs provide working professionals with evening and weekend courses,
                                 as well as networking opportunities to advance their careers or enter new fields.


 Certificate Programs  Educator Courses and Programs Community & Corporate Engagement Leadership for Public Agencies



Degrees



Degrees
EIP partners with CSUF colleges and departments to offer bachelor’s and master’s degrees,
                                 as well as preparation programs for those looking to apply to professional health-care,
                                 law and business schools.


 Online Degree Completion Programs  Master’s Programs  Pre-Health Program  Test Preparation Courses 



University Courses



University Courses
EIP expands access to University classes through Open University, Summer Session and
                                    Winter Session. Open University registration is open to the general public; Summer
                                    and Winter Sessions help Cal State Fullerton students graduate on-time or early.


 Open University  Summer Session  Winter Session 



Lifelong Learning



Lifelong Learning
Our lifelong learning opportunities range from programs for children to retirees,
                                 and include an on-campus arboretum  with classes and events for those of all ages.


 Fullerton Arboretum  Osher Lifelong Learning Institute 



Online



Online Programs
Online programs are structured with lectures and assignments, and allow you to interact
                                 and communicate with students and instructors/professors online.


 Online Certificate Programs  Online Degree Completion Programs  Online Programs for EducatorsOnline Training & Courses



International



International Programs
International students may study for one semester or complete an entire bachelor's
                                 or master's degree at CSUF. 


 International Programs  International Admissions  University Semester Abroad International Students & ScholarsStudy Abroad & Global Engagement









Extension and International ProgramsMaster's Degree Programs

Applied Computer Science

Software Engineering


 














Master’s Programs
Extension and International Programs provides advanced degrees from Cal State Fullerton
                                       with flexible formats – such as evening classes or an accelerated schedule – that
                                       match the diverse needs of our students.






Earn Your Master's Degree at CSUF




Extension and International Programs (EIP) partners with the University’s academic
                                       departments and colleges to create master’s programs with more flexibility. This includes
                                       classes scheduled in the evening or an accelerated schedule.
The curriculum, faculty and academic advisement for all of these programs are managed
                                       by the CSUF academic department—and you will earn a Master's degree from Cal State
                                       Fullerton.
Below is the current list of Master’s degrees we offer. Click on the program name
                                       for more information, including cost, program dates and application details.
Choose a CSUF Degree to Advance Your Career





Program Name
Units
Time Commitment
Location
Description




Accelerated MS in Software Engineering (AMSE)  
30 units
1 ½ years (full-time)
Fullerton Campus
The accelerated program prepares you for a career as a software engineer or manager
                                                      in the industry or government agency; or for advanced study as a researcher.


Accelerated MS in Applied Computer Science (AMACS)  
30 units
1 ½ years (full-time)
Fullerton Campus
The accelerated program prepares you for a career as app developers and other computer
                                                      science-related fields in the tech industry.


Fully Employed MBA (FEMBA)  
42 units
3 years (part-time)
Fullerton Campus
The program allows you to continue working full-time while pursuing your MBA to further
                                                      your leadership skills and gain the tools you need to be a strong competitor in today’s
                                                      marketplace.


Master of Social Work Flex (MSW Flex)  
60 units
3 years (part-time)
Fullerton Campus
The CSWE accredited program prepares you to take on leadership roles in public social
                                                      service organizations. It offers conveniently scheduled evening classes and fieldwork
                                                      experiences.


MS in Counseling  
63 units
3 years plus 1 term (part-time)
Fullerton Campus
The cohort program prepares you to work in a variety of environments, like schools
                                                      or mental health agencies, and also qualifies you to pursue LMFT and LPCC licensure.





Can't decide between MSW Flex and MS in Counseling program or AMSE and AMACS program?
                                       View our MSW-Counseling or AMSE-AMACS comparison fact sheet to help you make an informed decision.
All graduate programs are managed by a CSUF academic department, but administered
                                          by Extension and International Programs. This means programs are self-support (not
                                          funded by state tax revenue) and tuition reflects a slightly higher rate than similar
                                          programs. 







Stay in touch
To receive program and application updates, join the email list for the degree program
                                          you are interested in. If you submit a question with your email sign-up, a staff member
                                          will get back to you as soon as possible.




Online Form - Online Form - Master










Stay in touch
To receive program and application updates, join the email list for the degree program
                              you are interested in. If you submit a question with your email sign-up, a staff member
                              will get back to you as soon as possible.

CSUF is committed to ensuring equal accessibility to our users. Let us know about
            any accessibility problems you encounter using this website.We'll do our best to improve things and get you the information you need.
